elucidate.definition: to explain or make something clear
elucidate.examples: work such as theirs will help to elucidate this matter

non sequitur.definition: a conclusion or statement that does not logically follow from the previous argument or statement
non sequitur.examples: his weird mixed metaphors and non sequiturs

obfuscate.examples: the spelling changes will deform some familiar words and obfuscate their etymological origins

perfunctory.definition: carried out without real interest, feeling, or effort
